title: Cool Whip
summaries: The Cool Whip is a Hardmode whip. Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy.

Upon striking an enemy, it will create a temporary snowflake projectile that chases nearby enemies, dealing 15 damage to them on contact. The summoned snowflake has 30 <linked>armor penetration</linked> and is not affected by damage bonuses outside of <linked>banners</linked>. If a snowflake is already summoned, attacking with the whip will reset its timer instead of creating a new one. It also inflicts the <linked>Frostbite</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> for 4 seconds.
If the Cool Whip hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 30%.
